abstract: The Looking Ahead column last Monday, about financial events scheduled this week, erroneously included one company among those that will report quarterly earnings. The company, Smithfield Foods, will report its earnings on Thursday, March 12; it did not report them last Thursday.
snippet: The Looking Ahead column last Monday, about financial events scheduled this week, erroneously included one company among those that will report quarterly earnings. The company, Smithfield Foods, will report its earnings on Thursday, March 12; it d...
lead_paragraph: The Looking Ahead column last Monday, about financial events scheduled this week, erroneously included one company among those that will report quarterly earnings. The company, Smithfield Foods, will report its earnings on Thursday, March 12; it did not report them last Thursday.

abstract: Kenneth D. Lewis, the chief executive of Bank of America, said Monday that the bank made a “tactical mistake” in requesting $20 billion in government aid to bolster its acquisition of Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth D. Lewis, the chief executive of Bank of America, said Monday that the bank made a “tactical mistake” in requesting $20 billion in government aid to bolster its acquisition of Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Lewis Says He Regrets Size of Merrill Aid
